name: Jewel Rush
description:
An arcade inspired game about collecting rubies and avoiding monsters. In this game you play as Julie, a young girl who wandered off into a cave filled with monsters. Collect rubies to fill up your meter, and then use your meter to run faster and avoid enemies. There are also four green Blast Crystals around the map, which allow you to release a shockwave that destroys monsters by pressing C or Z. Between each level, you can spend rubies to upgrade your stats to help you better tackle the next level.

Sound Effect Credits:

- Impact Sounds by Kenney

- Digital Audio by Kenney

- RPG Audio by Kenney

- JRPG Style UI Sounds by KillaMaaki

- Machine Death Sound by OptimusDu

Music Credits:

- On The Run by Zane Little Music

- Lick The Chorus by Zane Little Music

- It Takes A Hero by Zane Little Music
